results.title: Metformin prevents ischemia reperfusion-induced oxidative stress in the fatty liver by attenuation of reactive oxygen species formation.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Gastrointest Liver Physiol
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment prevented acute stress-induced @<m>DISEASE_Hypersensitivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006967 @@@necroinflammatory reaction@@@, reduced alanine aminotransferase and aspartate aminotransferase serum activity, and diminished lipoperoxidation.
